Spotlight






ALUMNI SPOTLIGHTData Science
				

					Data science certificate graduate Prijii Eapen shares how he applied knowledge from his program to drive business results.
           		  
				
Watch video



TRANSFER CREDITS
				From Certificate to Degree

				UCI DCE is proud to partner with a number of universities to provide you a “next step” on your educational pathway. Discover how you can apply your DCE certificate credits toward an undergraduate or graduate degree.
			
Learn more

“I’ve seen so many individuals in the field be very successful after completing the program. It’s helped them launch into different academic studies. It’s helped them be seen as a more viable resource in the workplace as a go-to individual for knowledge and skill.”
Najla DeBow
            Human Resources Management

Trending Now











trending
                            
Introducing Career Advancement Network (CAN)
A new suite of career services including workshops, webinars, individual career coaching, technology tools and resources, and more.








trending
                            
The Rise of the Project Manager
The expertise of a project manager is now considered mission critical because projects are more complex and complicated.







trending
                            
Student Stories
DCE is proud to play a part in helping our students reach their professional and career goals. Hear their stories and learn about their career journeys.







law
                            
Advancing Career and Journey in Law with Specialized Skills
A Contract Management education reignited Amy Ferguson's interest in law and paved the way for her to obtain her degree.
